question:
[Harry] and his sister [Morgan] went out for ice cream. [Valerie] and her sister, [Morgan], went to church. [Morgan]'s mom, [Debra], was sick, and could n't make it, and [Morgan] told the pastor so he would pray for a speedy recovery. [Victor] bought gifts for his lovely sister, [Machelle] [Cyrus] likes to visit his sister. Her name is [Machelle]. [Melissa] went shoe shopping with her sister [Valerie]. [Kerrie] bought her mother, [Joy], a puppy for her birthday. [Debra] and her daughter [Joy] went to see a movie yesterday and then got ice cream afterwards. [Kerrie] and [Cyrus] are siblings who are enjoying lunch together. [Harry] likes to visit his sister. Her name is [Melissa].
Question: How is [Morgan] related to [Victor]?
